author: pierred
msg: Apply larryi fixes to jasper in tomcat-4.0.
The API doc says for PageContext.include():
"The current JspWriter "out" for this JSP is flushed as a side-effect of this
call, prior to processing the include."
Adding the out.flush() call to PageContext.include() and removing it from
the code generation for <jsp:include ...>.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:	larryi
Reviewed by:

author: craigmcc
msg: Simple filter that dumps the properties of each request to the corresponding
servlet context log before passing the request on to be processed.  Very
useful in debugging.

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove comment-out characters ("#") from message keys that are potentially
used in the source code (in StandardWrapperValve).
Submitted by: Bernd Eilers <bei@staroffice.de>
PR: BugRat Bug Report #107

author: craigmcc
msg: Make HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect() send a descriptive message (Moved
Temporarily) along with the status code, rather than the URL of the
location to which the redirect points.
Submitted by: Bill Forbes <bill_forbes@urscorp.com>
PR: BugRat Bug Report #106

author: craigmcc
msg: Set the path property of the session id cookie to "/" if we are running in
the root context.  Previously, such a cookie would receive no path at all,
and would therefore not be recognized properly for session maintenance in
the root context.
Submitted by: Bernd Eilers (bei@staroffice.de)
PR: BugRat Bug Report #105
